remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `startIndex` 和 `endIndex` 参数复制指定范围的路径数据。Use the `startIndex` and `endIndex` parameters to copy a specified range of the path data. ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径。Creates a graphics path. - 用几个基元和一些标记填充它。Populates it with several primitives and some markers. - 列出屏幕左侧的路径数据。Lists the path data on the left side of the screen. - 创建一个 并将其倒带。Creates a and rewinds it. - 将路径数据索引递增为第二个标记。Increments the path data index to the second marker. - 调用 方法将开始索引和结束索引之间包含的路径数据复制到点和类型数组。Calls the method to copy the path data contained between the start and end indexes to the points and types arrays. - 在屏幕右侧列出此复制的数据。Lists this copied data on the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径。Creates a graphics path. - 用几个基元和一些标记填充它。Populates it with several primitives and some markers. - 列出屏幕左侧的路径数据。Lists the path data on the left side of the screen. - 创建一个 并将其倒带。Creates a and rewinds it. - 将路径数据索引递增为第二个标记。Increments the path data index to the second marker. - 调用 方法以将路径数据复制到 `points` 和 `types` 数组。Calls the method to copy the path data to the `points` and `types` arrays. - 在屏幕右侧列出此复制的数据。Lists this copied data on the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 指示与此 关联的路径是否包含曲线。

span.span: Indicates whether the path associated with this contains a curve.

returns.span: 如果当前子路径包含曲线，该方法返回 ；否则，返回 。

span.span: This method returns if the current subpath contains a curve; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路径中的所有曲线均存储为贝塞尔样条序列。All curves in a path are stored as sequences of Bézier splines. 例如，将一个椭圆添加到路径时，可以指定矩形边框的左上角、宽度和高度。For example, when you add an ellipse to a path, you specify the upper-left corner, the width, and the height of the ellipse's bounding rectangle. 这些数字（左上角、宽度和高度）不存储在路径中;是椭圆转换为四个贝塞尔样条的序列。Those numbers (upper-left corner, width, and height) are not stored in the path; instead; the ellipse is converted to a sequence of four Bézier splines. 路径存储这些 Bezier 样条的端点和控制点。The path stores the endpoints and control points of those Bézier splines. 路径存储一个数据点数组，其中每个数据点都属于直线或贝塞尔样条。A path stores an array of data points, each of which belongs to a line or a Bézier spline. 如果数组中的某些点属于贝塞尔曲线，则 返回 `true` 。If some of the points in the array belong to Bézier splines, then returns `true`. 如果数组中的所有点都属于行，则 返回 `false` 。If all points in the array belong to lines, then returns `false`. 某些方法平展路径，这意味着路径中的所有曲线均转换为线条序列。Certain methods flatten a path, which means that all the curves in the path are converted to sequences of lines. 平展路径后， 将始终返回 `false` 。After a path has been flattened, will always return `false`. 调用 类的、 或 方法 将平展路径。Calling the , , or method of the class will flatten a path. ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建 对象 `myPath` 。Creates a object, `myPath`. - 添加三个线条、矩形和椭圆。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse. - 为创建一个 对象 `myPath` 。Creates a object for `myPath`. - 测试当前路径是否 `myPath` 包含曲线。Tests to see if the current path `myPath` contains a curve. - 在消息框中显示测试的结果。Shows the result of the test in a message box. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 将迭代程序移至路径中的下一个标记。

span.span: Moves the iterator to the next marker in the path.

MemberSignature.Value: public int NextMarker (System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath path);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 NextMarker(class System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath path) cil managed
Public Function NextMarker (path As GraphicsPath) As Integer
public: int NextMarker(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::GraphicsPath ^ path);
member this.NextMarker : System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath -> int

param.name: path
param.span: 将点复制到其中的 对象。

span.span: The object to which the points will be copied.

summary.span: 此 对象具有与之关联的 对象。

span.span: This object has a object associated with it.

summary.span: 方法将关联的 增加到其路径中的下一标记，并将当前标记和下一标记（或路径末尾）之间包含的所有点复制到下一个传入该参数的 对象。

span.span: The method increments the associated to the next marker in its path and copies all the points contained between the current marker and the next marker (or end of path) to a second object passed in to the parameter.

returns.span: 此标记和下一标记间的点数。

span.span: The number of points between this marker and the next.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可在路径中设置标记。Use the method to set markers in a path. 标记用于创建子路径组。Markers are used to create groups of subpaths. 一个或多个子路径可以介于两个标记之间。One or more subpaths can be between two markers. ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 添加三个线条、矩形、椭圆和两个标记。Adds three lines, a rectangle, an ellipse, and two markers. - 列出所有路径的点到屏幕左侧的值。Lists the values of all the path's points to the left side of the screen. - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 创建一个 对象， `myPathSection` 用于接收复制的点。Creates a object, `myPathSection`, to receive copied points. - 调用 方法，该方法将循环访问第一个标记并复制该标记与旁边的所有点 `myPathSection` 。Calls the method, which iterates to the first marker and copies all the points contained between that marker and the next to `myPathSection`. - 返回复制到的点数 `markerPoints` 。Returns the number of points copied to `markerPoints`. - 列出了标记编号（第一个标记）和它包含在屏幕右侧的点数。Lists the marker number (the first marker) and number of points it contains to the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可在路径中设置标记。Use the method to set markers in a path. 标记用于创建子路径组。Markers are used to create groups of subpaths. 一个或多个子路径可以介于两个标记之间。One or more subpaths can be between two markers. ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 添加三个线条、一个矩形和一个椭圆3/4，其中每个都有标记。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse ¾ with markers between each. - 将点数组的值绘制到屏幕上。Draws the values for the array of points to the screen. - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 调用 方法。Calls the method. - 使用从迭代调用返回的值，将 每个标记的起始点和结束点绘制到屏幕上。Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to to draw the start and stop points for each marker to the screen. - 将总点数的值绘制到屏幕上。Draws the value for the total number of points to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 添加三个线条、矩形和椭圆。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse. - 列出屏幕左侧的所有点的值。Lists the values of all the points to the left side of the screen. - 创建一个 并将其倒带。Creates a and rewinds it. - 在 `for` 循环中，使用和方法循环访问各个 点 。In a `for` loop, iterates through the points using the and methods. - 使用从迭代调用返回的值，列出子路径编号、其中的点数，以及路径指向屏幕右侧的类型。Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to list the subpath number, the number of points in it, and the type of the path points to the right side of the screen. - 显示屏幕上的总点数的值。Displays the value for the total number of points to the screen. 请注意， `ListPathPoints` 是一个帮助器函数，用于将所有显示代码从图形路径代码中分离出来。Note that `ListPathPoints` is a helper function that separates most (not all) of the display code from the graphics path code. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#6)]

span.span: If there are no more figures to retrieve, zero is returned.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 添加三个线条、矩形、椭圆和两个标记。Adds three lines, a rectangle, an ellipse, and two markers. - 列出所有路径的点到屏幕左侧的值。Lists the values of all the path's points to the left side of the screen. - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 创建一个 对象， `myPathSection` 用于接收复制的点。Creates a object, `myPathSection`, to receive copied points. - 调用 方法，该方法循环访问第三个子路径（图）并将该子路径中包含的所有点复制到该 `myPathSection` 路径，并返回复制到的点数 `subpathPoints` 。Calls the method, which iterates to the third subpath (figure) and copies all the points contained in that subpath to the `myPathSection` path, and also returns the number of points copied to `subpathPoints`. - 在屏幕右侧列出子路径编号和它包含的点数。Lists the subpath number and number of points it contains to the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#7)]

param.name: startIndex
param.span: [out] 接收下一子路径的起始索引。

param.name: endIndex
param.span: [out] 接收下一子路径的结束索引。

param.name: isClosed

span.span: [out] Indicates whether the subpath is closed.

summary.span: 将 移至路径中的下一子路径。

span.span: Moves the to the next subpath in the path.

summary.span: 下一子路径的起始索引和结束索引包含在 [out] 参数中。

span.span: The start index and end index of the next subpath are contained in the [out] parameters.
The number of subpaths in the object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 添加三个线条、矩形和椭圆。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse. - 将点数组的值绘制到屏幕上。Draws the values for the array of points to the screen. - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 调用 方法。Calls the method. - 使用从迭代调用返回的值，将 每个子路径的开始值和结束值绘制到屏幕。Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to to draw the start and stop values for each subpath to the screen. - 将子路径的总数值绘制到屏幕上。Draws the value for the total number of subpaths to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 将此 重绕到其关联路径的起始处。

span.span: Rewinds this to the beginning of its associated path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次调用 迭代器的方法时，将获取该迭代器的关联路径的第一个图形（子路径）。The first time you call the method of an iterator, it gets the first figure (subpath) of that iterator's associated path. 第二次获取第二个图形，依此类推。The second time, it gets the second figure, and so on. 调用 方法时，序列将开始; 即，调用后 ，下一次调用将 获取路径中的第一个图形。When you call the method, the sequence starts over; that is, after you call , the next call to gets the first figure in the path. 和 方法的行为类似。The and methods behave similarly.
